## Compliance Checklist

Please confirm the repository meets these requirements:

- [ ] Skills follow the [Agent Skills Standard](https://agentskills.io/specification) format
- [ ] Each skill has a `SKILL.md` with valid YAML frontmatter (`name` and `description` required)
- [ ] Skills are in a `skills/` directory (or similar clear structure)
- [ ] Repository is publicly accessible
- [ ] Content is appropriately licensed
